name: recipe-box
description: A simple recipe box written in React

scripts.build:scripts: browserify -x jquery -x bootstrap -x toastr -x keymirror -x react -x react-dom -x react-router -x react-bootstrap-confirm -x flux -x connect-history-api-fallback -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react stage-0 ] ]  src/main.js -o dist/scripts/main.js
scripts.build:vendor: browserify -r jquery -r bootstrap -r toastr -r keymirror -r react -r react-dom -r react-router -r react-bootstrap-confirm -r flux -r connect-history-api-fallback -o dist/scripts/vendor.js && cat node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css node_modules/toastr/build/toastr.css | postcss --local-plugins -u cssnano -o dist/styles/bundle.css
scripts.build:styles: npm run cleanuptmp && npm run createtmp && npm run build:scss && npm run build:css && npm run cleanuptmp
scripts.watch:js: onchange src/*.js src/**/*.js -e src/test/**/*.js -e dist/**/*.js -- npm run build:scripts
scripts.build: npm run cleanup && npm run setupfolder && npm run build:vendor && npm run build:html && npm run build:scripts && npm run build:styles
scripts.start: npm run build && run-p watch:* -s server

author: Greg Smith
